notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Coordination and performance of antistaphylococcal activity testing and its related data analysis, and manuscript drafting, M.N.; participation in investigation and data analysis M.H.; coordination of the GC/MS analysis; K.U.; participation in manuscript preparation; J.R.; conceptualization and coordination of the whole study and finalization of the manuscript. L.K. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
